hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:"There is a time on Friday at which no Muslim would ask Allah for what is good but He would give it to him." And further said: "This is a very short time

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّاعَةِ الَّتِي فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The (special) time that occurs on Friday
